posts.snippet: Most developers do personal projects. They offer an opportunity to try new technologies, or refine existing skills. Yet, finishing a personal project on time is one aspect that is commonly ignored.
posts.title: Finishing Personal Projects on Time

posts.snippet: Learning new tech is part and parcel of being a software engineer. Working in a team, we seldom are able to convince everyone to use the same tech stack we are comfortable with. Someone has to learn a new framework or language one way or the other. Hence, the ability to pick up new tech is valuable.
posts.title: How to Learn New Technologies
